org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.retry

Class ClassifierSimpleRetryPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.retry.policy.SimpleRetryPolicy
      • org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.retry.ClassifierSimpleRetryPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.retry.RetryPolicy

    public class ClassifierSimpleRetryPolicy
extends org.springframework.retry.policy.SimpleRetryPolicy
    An extension to the existing SimpleRetryPolicy to allow for using an arbitrary Classifier instance to determine if a given Throwable should trigger a retry.
